command: from worldsim.world import create_world; from worldsim.types import SimConfig; cfg = SimConfig(width=8, height=8, seed=42); w = create_world(cfg); st = w.get_state(); assert st.width == 8 and st.height == 8 and st.step_number == 0 and len(st.agents) > 0

from worldsim.world import create_world; from worldsim.types import SimConfig; w1 = create_world(SimConfig(8, 8, 42)); w2 = create_world(SimConfig(8, 8, 42)); assert w1.get_state() == w2.get_state(); r1 = w1.step(); r2 = w2.step(); assert r1 == r2, 'not deterministic'

from worldsim.world import create_world; from worldsim.types import SimConfig; cfg = SimConfig(width=10, height=10, seed=99, initial_density=0.4); w = create_world(cfg); p0 = len(w.get_state().agents); r = w.step(); p1 = len(r.world.agents); assert p0 + r.births - r.deaths == p1, f'pop invariant: {p0}+{r.births}-{r.deaths}!={p1}'
